titles.title: Referring the bill (H.R. 4037), entitled "For the relief of Francisco Rivera and Alfonso Calderon", to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.
Referring the bill (H.R. 4037), entitled "For the relief of Francisco Rivera and Alfonso Calderon", to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Refers H.R. 4037 (private relief) to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report.
